trans-unit.source: Direct access to DSC resource methods
trans-unit.target: Acceso directo a los métodos de recursos de DSC

trans-unit.source: The [Invoke-DscResource](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt517869.aspx) cmdlet has been added to allow direct access to DSC resources and their methods (Get, Set or Test).
trans-unit.target: El cmdlet [Invoke-DscResource](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt517869.aspx) se agregó para permitir el acceso directo a los recursos de DSC y a sus métodos (Get, Set o Test).

trans-unit.source: It can be used by third-parties that want to take advantage of DSC resources.
trans-unit.target: Los pueden usar terceros que quieran sacar partido de los recursos de DSC.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Calling DSC resource methods directly](../dsc/directCallResource.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, consulte [Llamada directa a los métodos de recursos de DSC](../dsc/directCallResource.md).
